metadata.name: Wayaane62 1/62
metadata.description:
CC0 pixel stuff for 62 days by a 10-year-old. Created on studio.noundry.wtf

This all started when I saw this amazing project studio.noundry.wtf by @volkyeth and then I showed it to my 10-year-old bro and told him it's a good site if you wanna have some fun, the next day he showed me two pixel arts that he created on studio.noundry.wtf and he kept doing that for some days so I asked him "do you wanna do this regularly?" he said "yes", I said "ok then your birthday is coming up in some time(26-01-2022) do it every day till your birthday then we compile them and mint an NFT on your birthday" he doesn't understand NFTs and stuff but I explained to him that people will collect it like an art, and he was consistent, he did it, here they are. I'm so proud of him thank you Volky and Nouns for making him fall in love with pixels and design.

Proof he did it regularly for 62 days: twitter.com/wayaane62
